## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [1: RNA-Seq reads to counts](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/rna-seq-reads-to-counts/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
